commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder consultation group for the Fitness Check of EU consumer and marketing law #E03423#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3423#Member#C#Multi-stakeholder Group on Environmental Claims#E03327#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3327#Member#C#Stakeholder expert group to support the application of the Package Travel and Linked Travel Arrangements Directive (2015/2302)#E03617#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3617#Member#C#European Consumer Consultative Group#E00849#Bob Schmitz#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=849#Member#B#Other
goals__remit: Consumer protection via membership support in consumer litigation, information ( personalized, info material, website, monthly magazine, thematic brochures,...), policymaking ( opinions on EU drafts, national implementation texts,...), representation in national and EU bodies such as ECCG ( European Consumer Consultative Group).
